column5: The Ministry have reduced the limits to the following on both Balsam & Mitchell lakes they are as follows.Walleye catch & possession limit of 3 which must be less than 37cm(14.6 inches) or greater than 55cm(21.6 inches). Conservation licence limit of 1 which must be less than 37cm(14.6 inches) or greater than 55cm(21.6 inches).
